docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Dec. 28--Brazil and Uruguay signed today a series of treaties and joint declarations. These dealt with trade, navigation, cultural exchanges and other aspects of relations between the two countries.
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Dec. 28--Brazil and Uruguay signed today a series of treaties and joint declarations. These dealt with trade, navigation, cultural exchanges and other aspects of relations between the two countries.
docs.abstract: Min de Macedo Soares activities in various neighboring nations linked with regime drive to increase econ and pol influence abroad

headline.main: URUGUAYAN PACTS SIGNED BY BRAZIL; Montevideo Accords Linked to Active Foreign Policy of Kubitschek Regime Peron Exerted Pressure Work on New Bridge

byline.original: By TAD SZULC Special to The New York Times

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Dec. 29--A United States Navy task force will conduct anti-submarine warfare exercises with Uruguay in mid-February. Shortly thereafter it will join an Argentine naval group for similar maneuvers.
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Dec. 29--A United States Navy task force will conduct anti-submarine warfare exercises with Uruguay in mid-February. Shortly thereafter it will join an Argentine naval group for similar maneuvers.
docs.abstract: USN task force plans anti-submarine exercises with Uruguay in mid-Feb, with Argentina later; 1st such operations in S Atlantic since World War II; USN repr comments

headline.main: 3 NAVIES TO DRILL IN SOUTH ATLANTIC; U.S. to Hold Anti-Submarine Exercise With Uruguay, Later With Argentina Defense Duties Assigned No Date for Parley Navy Confirms Plans
